order.Comments:
Notes: * please let us know if any of the samples requested are not readily available or made to order products
Customs Info: Please ensure that the corresponding paperwork includes the true value of the product and to include "no commercial value" on the invoice. If these values are incorrect, the samples will be seized by the CBSA for at least 90 business days. Provide the following information if listing L.V. Lomas as importer of record. Customs Broker: AXXESS INTL. - Fax: 905- 672-5632 or Phone: 905-672-0270
